name: Beetle, Clacker Swarm
description: The Clacker Swarm is composed of many aggressive beetles that make a constant clacking noise, representing a formidable threat to those who are surrounded, dealing notable thunder damage with their constant clacking.
memorable: Its unique ability to swarm and inflict thunder damage makes it a challenging encounter, especially in tight spaces.
goals: Typically, the swarm acts aggressively to defend its territory or to overwhelm creatures it perceives as threats.
relations: May be found in ecosystems rich in various insects, often cohabiting with other pest creatures.
environment: Commonly found in woodland areas, gardens, or fields where beetles gather.
strengths: Immunity to several debilitating conditions makes it difficult to control in combat.
weaknesses: Extremely low Strength and Intelligence scores limit its physical capabilities and tactical awareness.
attacks: The swarm can bite, dealing significant piercing damage, enhancing its threat level when it is at full strength.
most_powerful_ability: Constant Clacking, dealing thunder damage to creatures that begin their turn in its space.
senses: Possesses blindsight for up to 30 feet, allowing it to navigate and detect threats without relying on sight.
skills: Has an average perception skill, able to detect its surroundings despite a low passive perception score.
additional_information: Swarm can move through openings suitable for Tiny creatures.
The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
Struggles in prolonged encounters due to its inability to recover health.
Small size allows it to swarm and occupy the same space as other creatures.
